title: Google to add Bard AI to voice assistant, following Amazon
description: Big Tech companies such as Amazon, Google and Apple are under pressure to add “generative” AI chatbots to their longstanding voice assistants.

title: Google’s new Pixel 8 phones reflect a deepening obsession with AI
description: These days, it seems like everyone is trying to build AI tools. Google is no exception, and it’s cramming those tools into its new phones.

title: Celebrities warn followers not to be duped by AI deepfakes
description: Actor Tom Hanks, journalist Gayle King and YouTuber MrBeast said this week that their deepfake images are being used for sales or scams without their permission.
